Script.ScriptSource: ; this stage is set if you know about Red or Shorty ; used to conditionalize "failure" objective appearing
setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 10 1 setstage MS01 5
setObjectiveCompleted MS01 10 1 setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 20 1 setstage MS01 5
; in case you find Shorty first setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 25 1 setstage MS01 5

setstage MS01 5 setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 30 1 setObjectiveCompleted MS01 20 1 setObjectiveCompleted MS01 25 1 ShowMap BigTownMapMarkerREF Set RedRef.rescued to 1 Set RedRef.followingPlayer to 1 rewardKarma 100 ; put player in allied faction player.addToFaction MS01RescueFaction 0 ; remove from Doctor faction until back at Big Town RedREF.removeFromFaction DoctorsDialogueFaction
setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 40 1 setObjectiveCompleted MS01 20 1

setstage MS01 5 setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 45 1 setObjectiveCompleted MS01 20 1 setObjectiveCompleted MS01 40 1 ShowMap BigTownMapMarkerREF set ShortyRef.rescued to 1 set ShortyRef.followingPlayer to 1 ShortyRef.setav Aggression ShortyRef.startingAggression ShortyRef.setRestrained 0 ShortyRef.removeFromFaction MS01KitchenFaction rewardKarma 100 ; put player in allied faction player.addToFaction MS01RescueFaction 0 ; clear anything that he might be mad about ShortyREF.ClearActorsFactionsPlayerEnemyFlag ShortyREF.stopcombat
setstage MS01 25

; finished rescue part of quest and got rewarded CompleteAllObjectives MS01 rewardXP 300 ;addachievement 14 set StickyRef.HasBigTownTopics to 1 ; set variables for when town should be killed if player leaves set MS01.killTownDay to GameDaysPassed + 2 set MS01.killTown to 1

; teach guns set MS01.shoot to 1 ShortyRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 BittercupRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 FlashRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 RedRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 PappyRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 TimebombRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 KimbaRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 StickyRef.addItem NPCsettlerGun 1 ;enable the shooting range havoc objects xMS01ShootingRangeToggle.enable set MS01.townMob to 1 ; make sure they don't do normal behavior set ms01.townEVP to 1
; teach sneak set MS01.sneak to 1 set ms01.townEVP to 1
; teach mines setQuestDelay MS01 .01 set ms01.Mine to 1 set ms01.townEVP to 1 player.additem weapMineFrag 1
; teach robots set ms01.robot to 1 set ms01.townEVP to 1 MS01Protectron1Ref.setDestroyed 0 MS01Protectron2Ref.setDestroyed 0
; done teaching SetQuestDelay MS01 0 ; back to default set MS01.townMob to 1 ; make sure they don't do normal behavior

; Red back in Big Town SetObjectiveCompleted MS01 30 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed MS01 50 1 RedREF.addToFaction DoctorsDialogueFaction 0 RedREF.addToFaction BigTownFaction 0 set RedREF.ArrivedAtBigTown to 1 set RedREF.followingPlayer to 0 RedREF.resethealth ; remove player from allied faction player.RemoveFromFaction MS01RescueFaction

; Shorty back in Big Town ShortyREF.addToFaction BigTownFaction 0 set ShortyREF.followingPlayer to 0 set ShortyREF.ArrivedAtBigTown to 1 SetObjectiveCompleted MS01 40 1 SetObjectiveCompleted MS01 45 1 ShortyREF.resethealth
; remove player from allied faction if Red is rescued or back player.RemoveFromFaction MS01RescueFaction
; Red has died ;turn off objectives about Rescuing Red SetObjectiveDisplayed MS01 30 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed MS01 50 0
ShowMessage MS01RedDied ;turn on failure objective setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 49 1
; fail quest in this case (Red's back, and died, and the quest isn't complete yet) setstage MS01 250
; Shorty has died ;turn off objectives about Rescuing Shorty SetObjectiveDisplayed MS01 40 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed MS01 45 0
ShowMessage MS01ShortyDied
;turn on failure objective setObjectiveDisplayed MS01 49 1
showMessage MS01QuestFailedMessage
; everyone in Big Town has died completeAllObjectives MS01 stopquest ms01 stopQuest MS01Crowd

;player has helped defend the town from Mutants ;Quest is stopped after the cheering scene in MS01QuestScript startQuest MS01Fin rewardKarma 150 Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MS01Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitReady to 1 completeAllObjectives MS01

;Since killing Red / Shorty displays objectives, make sure we call this *before* killing them to avoid having the new objectives show up as Completed completeAllObjectives MS01 Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MS01Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitReady to 1 ;just in case they aren't dead and the player tells the town he's not doing it if RedRef.getInCell GermPoliceHQ == 1 RedRef.disable endif if ShortyRef.getInCell GermPoliceHQ == 1 ShortyRef.disable endif

;The player has turned his back on the town and they have been killed offscreen by mutants ; NPC scripts handle killing them when this stage is set stopquest ms01 stopQuest MS01Crowd Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.MS01Clear to ( GameDaysPassed + 1 ) Set RadioGalaxyNewsQuest.ExploitReady to 1

;!!!!!!!!!!!!DEBUG END QUEST!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ;This sets up the quest as done so that Erik can test the packages etc. of Big Town people set StickyRef.playerEscorting to 1 set stickyRef.arrivedAtBigTown to 1 set StickyRef.followingPlayer to 2 stickyRef.moveto xMS01BigTown
set RedRef.rescued to 1 set RedRef.followingPlayer to 2 RedRef.moveto xMS01BigTown
set ShortyRef.kitchenStage to -1 set ShortyRef.rescued to 1 set ShortyRef.arrivedAtBigTown to 1 set ShortyRef.followingPlayer to 2 ShortyRef.moveto xMS01BigTown
set MS01.trained to 1 set MS01.mutantsDealtWith to 1 setStage MS01 20 setStage MS01 30 setStage MS01 40 setStage MS01 45 setStage MS01 50 setStage MS01 200

Objective.Description: Rescue the Big Town captives from the Super Mutants.
Escort Red safely back to Big Town.
Escort Shorty safely back to Big Town
Ask the people of Big Town about their captured friends.
Explain Red's death to the people of Big Town.
Speak to Red about your reward.
